info.name: DNS TXT Record Detected
author: pdteam
info.description: A DNS TXT record was detected. The TXT record lets a domain admin leave notes on a DNS server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 4067
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;rdv-insertion.fr.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 4067
;; flags: qr rd ra ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 5, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;rdv-insertion.fr.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
rdv-insertion.fr.	600	IN	TXT	"4|https://www.rdv-insertion.fr"
rdv-insertion.fr.	600	IN	TXT	"v=spf1 include:mx.ovh.com ~all"
rdv-insertion.fr.	600	IN	TXT	"v=spf1 mx include:spf.sendinblue.com ~all"
rdv-insertion.fr.	600	IN	TXT	"Sendinblue-code:8a7575490e676f56fad614fdf8a16cda"
rdv-insertion.fr.	600	IN	TXT	"google-site-verification=5c-bH2RgJsjwcmF5pPbaIRvRN2BDuxzRyxvfIjO4LIo"
